responsibilities: Developed an EV Management Dashboard using TypeScript, integrating CMS, NEXUS, and third-party APIs, with D3 maps for dynamic visualizations.

Streamlined project management with Jira and ensured effective team communication via Slack for successful project delivery.
Built Interactive Web Components with React, ensuring responsive and seamless user experiences.
Leveraged Redux for Efficient State Management in complex web applications.
Utilized Git and Bitbucket for Collaborative Development, smooth teamwork, and streamlined workflows.
Built "Maya," a Dialogflow chatbot, integrating with Google Assistant for appointment scheduling.
Automated appointments using Dialogflow and data with Firebase Cloud Firestore for scheduling.
Developed a notification system using webhooks and Cloud Firestore to keep customers informed about their vehicle servicing status, to enhance user engagement with the application.
